meanings.definition: The small projection in which the mammary ducts of female mammals terminate and from which milk can be secreted.
meanings.sent1: The baby drank milk from the mother's nipples.
meanings.sent2: She felt uncomfortable when her nipples were sore.
meanings.sent3: The kitten playfully batted at the mother cat's nipples.
meanings.sent4: The nipples of the flower petals glistened with dew.
meanings.sent5: The nipples of the mountain peaks were covered in snow.

meanings.definition: A small protuberance on a surface or organ.
meanings.sent1: The artist carefully painted the tiny nipples on the statue.
meanings.sent2: The cold made his nipples harden.
meanings.sent3: The car had small nipples on its tires for better grip.
meanings.sent4: The nipples of the cactus were sharp and prickly.
meanings.sent5: The nipples on the map indicated the mountain peaks.
